alert.note: Alert for Allamakee; Chickasaw; Clayton; Fayette; Howard; Winneshiek (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 04 at 7:54AM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will continuing to move east through southeast Minnesota and northeast Iowa... At 752 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles northwest of Wanamingo to near Fairbank. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Oelwein around 805 AM CDT. Maynard around 810 AM CDT. Rochester around 815 AM CDT. Arlington around 825 AM CDT. Strawberry Point and Volga around 835 AM CDT. Wabasha around 855 AM CDT. Guttenberg around 900 AM CDT. People attending Harmony 4th of July Celebration, and Soldiers Memorial Field in Rochester should seek safe shelter immediately! This includes Interstate 90 in Minnesota between mile markers 196 and 257. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Allamakee; Chickasaw; Clayton; Fayette; Howard; Winneshiek
